name: Applying Passivhaus to retrofit projects
location: This stream will take place in (room to be confirmed)
description: This session explores the EnerPHIT standard, the Passivhaus standard for retrofitting old buildings. It covers the cost and technical challenges of retrofit and includes examples from Retrofit for the Future projects

presentations.name: Comparative case studies exploring cost and technical challenges of building to passivhaus standards
presentations.speakers: Marion Baeli, Paul Davis & Partners Architects

presentations.name: Overview of Passivhaus EnerPHit and relationship to green deal
presentations.speakers: Representative from the Passivhaus Trust, Speaker tbc

presentations.name: Retrofit for the Future and Passivhaus
Case Study - Building in a conservation area
